abstract: Apps that give you a checklist-based way to account for the coffee preferences of your friends and colleagues.
snippet: Apps that give you a checklist-based way to account for the coffee preferences of your friends and colleagues.
lead_paragraph: Last week's App Smart column pointed out a few apps that help find specialty coffee shops when you're in an unfamiliar area, but for a lot of people, a more pressing task is just completing a coffee run smoothly.

headline.main: App Smart Extra: Keeping Track of Coffee Orders
